title: Időnként újra kell konfigurálni a Thunderbird-öt, nem emlékszik, hogy milyen fiókok voltak beállítva
content:
Szép napot!

Időnként újra kell konfigurálni a Thunderbird-öt, nem emlékszik, hogy milyen fiókok voltak beállítva. Másfél éve használom a rendszert, 3 postafiók van beállítva, ebből kettő komoly levélforgalmat bonyolít, és mindig a legrosszabkor jön, ha újra be kell állítanom ezeket a fiókokat egy újraindítás után. A levelek nem vesznek el, de ez roppant bosszantó! Mi lehet rá a megoldás?
creator: kemot001

title: User authenticated but not connected, server may have gone down
content: Since updating Thunderbird, I cannot access my Microsoft account. It shows the 'Authenticated but not connected' error message. I can access my emails on my mobile phone but not on my computer. I have changed the disable IPv6 to true, deleted my stored password and entered it manually .... nothing seems to be working. Any ideas? Thanks in advance
creator: marianne.fox

title: NON INVIA LE MAIL
content: Buongiorno, mi da questo errore "Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: x0cKqg14xyOt5x0cKqLhl3 invalid domain. Verificare l’indirizzo email nelle impostazioni dell’account e riprovare."
creator: info10186

title: Attached email
content:
Good morning, the new Supernova version has a strange behavior: if I open a message from an .eml file (on the filesystem) and this message contains an attachment which is another .eml file, this is not opened by double clicking but must be saved as .eml file on the filesystem to be able to open it. All of this does not happen if the message is opened from the account dashboard. Thanks for the help

Buongiorno, la nuova versione Supernova ha uno strano comportamento: se io apro un messaggio da un un file .eml (sul filesystem) e questo messaggio continene un allegato che è un altro file .eml, questo non viene aperto attraverso il doppio click ma occorre salvarlo come file .eml sul filesystemper poterlo aprire. Tutto qusto non capita se il messaggio viene aperto dal dashboard dell'account. Grazie dell'aiuto
creator: processor

title: have some problems with the new TB 115 main display.
content: hi all, 115 changed some stuff on the main display and I'm not able to fix it or understand why. in the screenshot the "quick filter" smaller button is not needed or can be moved down as there is another one on the main toolbar (orange arrow) while the messages display toggle is not really needed as I don't think anyone use it daily. the yellow lines show a whole unused column not needed at all (and I don't really need to know the exact number of messages in a folder, or have it consume a whole column...). the green circle around the messages is because I can't seem to make the main display have bigger fonts. it's a messy display like that. how can I fix that? thanks :)
creator: arch.yossi

title: E mail display suddenly changed, WHY
content: Why have you changed the Thunderbird email display? I do not like it. Selwyn.
creator: selwynrayner

title: Inbox has changed and difficult to use
content: Suddenly a new message will arrive with several related messages attached as happens with a search. The new message is not bolded and is difficult to see. What have a done? I have been using Thunderbird for at least 20 years and now feel lost.
creator: mskinsey

title: Persistent garbled message
content:
Hi Support,

These days I am getting more garbled messages and it is becoming so tiring to do inbox repair.

I am not happy with the Supernova version, the previous ones version 102 and earlier were much better and more stable.

Is there a permanent fix for such garbled messages? See below of one such example. No From/To/Subject etc.

Yes there were previous help given about this matter, but this is happening too often. I need a permanent solution. Not frequent repairing.

Regards.
creator: pasteltiara

title: Download new messages
content: Howdy When I click get messages it downloads both clients at the same time. I already unchecked all the boxes in settings for downloading automatically. Never had this problem before latest update. Thanks in advance Joe
creator: joeberk1
